DOC.brief_title: Enhanced Implementation Low Back Pain Guidelines General Practice
DOC.detailed_description: Introduction : There need knowledge introduce new guideline effectively general practice . A new low back pain treatment guideline implement Denmark . This guideline demand patient low back pain improve eight week primary care treatment refer secondary care spine centre . Methods : This cluster randomize trial . One hundred general practice define cluster randomly allocate enhanced usual implementation new guideline . The practice situate North Denmark Region count two hundred general practitioner ( GPs ) . General practice control group receive normal implementation new guideline , include newsletter briefing . In contrast intervention group receive enhance implementation strategy , add visit consultant , two different stratification tool feedback guideline compliance . The two stratification tool : The STarT back screen tool ( STarT ) `` Social Occupational Screening '' tool ( SOS ) . The two screening tool subgroups patient aid clinician choice treatment . Discussion : To evaluate change behaviour may improve guideline adherence patient treatment plan two Ph.d. study relation study ; one focus clinical one economic aspect study . In addition qualitative study plan patient refered specialist social medicine .
